```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
for (c in 42:100){
  BSData <- data.frame()
  for(i in 0:368){
    tmp <- read.csv(file= sprintf("partitioned/train_%s.csv", i), header=FALSE, sep=",")
    tmp <- tmp[sample(nrow(tmp)), ] 
    tmp <- tmp[sample(1000), ]
    BSData <- rbind(BSData, tmp)
  }
  
  zeros <- BSData[sample(nrow(BSData)), ]
  zeros <- zeros[sample(200000), ]
  
  ones <- read.csv(file= "partitioned/train_yes.csv", header=FALSE, sep=",")
  ones <- ones[sample(nrow(ones)), ]
  ones <- ones[sample(200000), ]
  
  combined <- rbind(zeros, ones)
  combined <- combined[sample(nrow(combined)), ]
  
  write.csv(combined, file = sprintf("subsamples/sub_%s.csv", c),row.names=FALSE, col.names = FALSE)
}
```
